data.name: KeyStroke
desc: Describes a key stroke for hotkeys etc.

items.name: KeyChar
lines: contains the Unicode character generated by this event or 0.

items.name: KeyCode
lines: contains the integer code representing the key of the event.
This is a constant from the constant group com::sun::star::awt::Key.

items.name: KeyFunc
lines: contains the function type of the key event.
This is a constant from the constant group com::sun::star::awt::KeyFunction.

items.name: Modifiers
lines: contains the modifier keys which were pressed while the event occurred.
Zero or more constants from the group com::sun::star::awt::KeyModifier.
